\n1.Log into your monday.com account.\n\:
1.Log into your monday.com account.

2.Click on your avatar/profile picture in the top right corner.

3.Select **Administration** (this requires you to have admin permissions).

4.Go to the **API** section.

5.Copy your personal token
Update Column Values of Specific Item: Update Column Values of Specific Item
Creates a new column in board.
Creates a new group in board.
Creates a new item inside a board.
Gets a list of board's items.
Gets column values of an item.
Updates multiple columns values of speci: Updates multiple columns values of specific item.
Upload a file to a column in Monday.
Creates status/dropdown labels if they a: Creates status/dropdown labels if they are missing. This requires permission to change the board structure.
Limit data output by specifying column I: Limit data output by specifying column IDs; leave empty to display all columns.
The file URL or base64 to upload.
Specific Column Value Updated in Board: Specific Column Value Updated in Board
Triggers when a new item is created in b: Triggers when a new item is created in board.
Triggers when a specific column value is: Triggers when a specific column value is updated in board.
